channel.title: Tom Probyn's notes
channel.description: Notes: for thoughts that are too long for mastodon and too short for a blog.

item.title: SMS
item.description: Why I only have one app for messaging, and why I'm using 1980s technology to do it.

item.title: Currency conversion in subtitles
item.description: A little idea I had today which I am giving away for free

item.title: VB6 is back
item.description: In which I get very nostalgic about how I learned to code
